Batch carbon footprint calculation

Source: R/calc_batch.R
calc_batch.Rd

Processes a dataset of farms and computes emissions per farm, returning a summary plus per-farm details (optionally).

calc_batch(
  data,
  tier = 2,
  boundaries = set_system_boundaries("farm_gate"),
  benchmark_region = NULL,
  save_detailed_objects = FALSE
)

Arguments

data

data.frame con una fila por tambo o ruta a un Excel.

tier

integer/numeric que define la metodología (p.ej. 1, 2, 3). Por defecto 2.

boundaries

Límites del sistema como devuelve set_system_boundaries().

benchmark_region

(opcional) código/región de benchmark (character).

save_detailed_objects

logical; si TRUE, retorna objetos detallados por tambo.

Value

Lista con $summary y $farm_results.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
farms <- data.frame(FarmID = c("A","B"), Milk_litres = c(5e5, 7e5), Cows_milking = c(100, 140))
res <- calc_batch(
  data = farms,
  tier = 2,
  boundaries = set_system_boundaries("farm_gate"),
  benchmark_region = "uruguay",
  save_detailed_objects = FALSE
)
str(res$summary)
} # }
